text: Hagi bronsi eri'na egaragi goli erina ne-ena, aini erina egaragi, silva eri'na ne-ena, zafa eri'na egaragi, bronsi eri'na ne-ena, have eri'na egaragi, aini eri'na egahue. Ana nehu'na rimpama fru huno mani avu'ava zana huntenugeno kegava hunegante'na, fatgo avu'ava'zamo'a ugota huno mika zana kegava hugahie.
